This package download data from snit (https://www.snitcr.go.cr)
text: can install development version snitr GitHub :

title: This package download data from snit (https://www.snitcr.go.cr)
code: library(snitr) ## basic example code capas <- list_IGN_5k() #> Linking to GEOS 3.11.0, GDAL 3.5.3, PROJ 9.1.0; sf_use_s2() is TRUE #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. #>  [1] "IGN_5:forestal2017_5k"      "IGN_5:cultivos2017_5k"      #>  [3] "IGN_5:curvas_5000"          "IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k"  #>  [5] "IGN_5:edificaciones2017_5k" "IGN_5:hidrografia_5000"     #>  [7] "IGN_5:limitecantonal_5k"    "IGN_5:limitedistrital_5k"   #>  [9] "IGN_5:limiteprovincial_5k"  "IGN_5:linea_costa_5000"     #> [11] "IGN_5:pastos2017_5k"        "IGN_5:urbano_5000"          #> [13] "IGN_5:vias_5000" layer_name <- "IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k" output_file <- "IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg" downloaded_file <- get_IGN_5k(layer_name, output_file = output_file) #> Reading layer `file479e3c9875ce' from data source  #>   `/private/var/folders/96/m4trt68j16v3n97qk3zkxrk40000gn/T/RtmpAJHYi3/file479e3c9875ce.geojson'  #>   using driver `GeoJSON' #> Simple feature collection with 475 features and 3 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 156147.2 ymin: 608238.1 xmax: 658879.4 ymax: 1241118 #> Projected CRS: CR05 / CRTM05 #> Deleting source `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg' failed #> Writing layer `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k' to data source  #>   `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg' using driver `GPKG' #> Writing 475 features with 3 fields and geometry type Multi Polygon.

title: Download IGN 1:25000 scale layers — get_IGN_25k
text: function allows downloading layers 1:25000 scale Instituto Geográfico Nacional, Costa Rica, Sistema Nacional de Información Territorial de Costa Rica  SNIT

title: Download IGN 1:25000 scale layers — get_IGN_25k
text: layer_name specific layer want download (e.g., IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k). output_format format download data (default GeoJSON, application/json). output_file path downloaded spatial data saved (e.g., .gpkg, .shp).

title: Download IGN 1:5000 scale layers — get_IGN_5k
text: function allows downloading layers 1:5000 scale Instituto Geográfico Nacional, Costa Rica, Sistema Nacional de Información Territorial de Costa Rica  SNIT

title: Download IGN 1:5000 scale layers — get_IGN_5k
text: layer_name specific layer want download (e.g., IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k). output_format format download data (default GeoJSON, application/json). output_file path downloaded spatial data saved (e.g., .gpkg, .shp).

title: List IGN 1:25000 scale layers — list_IGN_25k
text: function list available layers 1:25000 scale Instituto Geográfico Nacional, Costa Rica, Sistema Nacional de Información Territorial de Costa Rica  SNIT

title: List IGN 1:5000 scale layers — list_IGN_5k
text: function list available layers 1:5000 scale Instituto Geográfico Nacional, Costa Rica, Sistema Nacional de Información Territorial de Costa Rica  SNIT
